name: The Pearls of Davy Jones
description:
You are lost at sea, trapped in a pocket of ocean with naught but a radio riddle about some colourful pearls.

Find all Davy Jones’ pearls and you might escape his purgatory.

A first-person, swimming simulator with some light puzzle elements.

HOW TO PLAY:
Use WASD to move and the mouse to look around.

Press E to pick up objects (mainly skulls and pearls that you find).

Press E again to drop or add to the pedestals .
